title: Strengthening Clinical Practice Competencies: Online News Literacy Inquiry Learning Program for Working Professionals

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational digital literacy and ability to analyze scientific information
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for medical/nursing field practitioners

learning_goals: Participants can evaluate the credibility of online science news sources with over 85% accuracy.
Participants can verify the validity of news content by applying at least three analytical thinking frameworks.
Participants consistently engage in daily 15-minute inquiry-based learning activities via a mobile platform with a 90% participation rate.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
